CVideoFormat
struct
CVideoFormat

Defines the format for a video

Members
<uint32_t at Caustic::uint32_t> m_width

width of video in pixels

<uint32_t at Caustic::uint32_t> m_height

heightof video in pixels

bool m_topDown

is video oriented from top to bottom (pixel 0,0 in top left corner)

RECT m_rect

Video rect corrected for pixel aspect ratio

Module

import Imaging.Video.IVideo;

CAudioFormat
struct
CAudioFormat

Defines the audio format for a video

Members
<uint32_t at Caustic::uint32_t> m_numChannels

number of channels

<uint32_t at Caustic::uint32_t> m_bitsPerSample

bits per audio sample

Module

import Imaging.Video.IVideo;

IVideo

Interface to a video

import Imaging.Video.IVideo;
